tools.name: list_folders
tools.description:
Lists all available Outlook mail folders.

    Returns:
        A list of folder names (strings).

tools.name: list_recent_emails
tools.description:
Retrieves email titles from a specified folder within a given number of days. Caches email metadata.

    Args:
        days: Number of days to look back.
        folder_name: Specific folder name (default: Inbox).

    Returns:
        A list of dictionaries containing 'subject', 'sender', and 'received_time' for each email.

tools.name: search_emails
tools.description:
Searches emails by keyword or sender within a specified time range and folder.

    Args:
        query: Keyword or sender name.
        start_date: Start date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.
        end_date: End date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.
        folder_name: Folder to search (default: Inbox).

    Returns:
        A list of dictionaries with 'subject', 'sender', and 'received_time'.

tools.name: get_email_by_number
tools.description:
Retrieves the full content (body + attachments) of an email from the cached list.

    Args:
        email_number: Index of the email in the last retrieved list.

    Returns:
        A dictionary with 'subject', 'sender', 'body', and 'attachments' (list of file paths).

tools.name: reply_to_email_by_number
tools.description:
Replies to a specific email (by index) with a given message.

    Args:
        email_number: Index of the email in the last retrieved list.
        reply_text: The reply message.

    Returns:
        Confirmation message (success/failure).

tools.name: compose_email
tools.description:
Creates and sends a new email.

    Args:
        subject: Email subject.
        body: Email body.
        recipients: List of recipient email addresses.
        cc: List of CC recipients.

    Returns:
        Confirmation message (success/failure).

list_folders.purpose: 验证 list_folders 工具在默认参数下可以成功列出所有可用的Outlook邮件文件夹。
验证当Outlook连接不可用时，list_folders 工具是否能优雅地处理错误并返回适当的提示信息。
验证用户没有权限访问Outlook账户时，工具是否能够安全地拒绝操作并返回权限错误。
验证工具是否能正确处理Outlook中没有配置任何邮件文件夹的情况，并返回空列表。

list_folders.case_name: List Folders with Special Characters in Folder Names
list_folders.purpose: 验证工具能否正确处理包含特殊字符的Outlook文件夹名称。

list_folders.case_name: List Folders with Long Path Depth
list_folders.purpose: 验证工具能否处理Outlook中存在深层嵌套文件夹结构的情况。
验证工具在系统高负载情况下仍能稳定运行并返回结果。
验证工具在会话失效后能否安全退出并提示重新认证。

list_recent_emails.case_name: List Recent Emails in Inbox for 7 Days
list_recent_emails.purpose: 验证 list_recent_emails 工具在默认文件夹 'Inbox' 中，能够正确检索过去7天内的邮件标题、发件人和接收时间。

compose_email.purpose: 验证使用有效参数调用 compose_email 工具时是否能成功创建并发送邮件。

args.subject: Test Email
args.body: This is a test email body.

args.body: This is a test email with empty CC list.
